headline: Review & Preview: Stocks Jump Again. Will the Rally End With a Rate Cut?
summary: It’s Fed week, and the market is feeling good about the prospects of a rate cut.  The S&P 500 added 0.5% today, while the Nasdaq Composite rose 0.9%.  Meanwhile, the Nasdaq is enjoying its best September in 15 years—so much for the month’s scary reputation.

headline: Some of the Biggest AI Winners of 2025 Are Data Storage Stocks
summary: Shares of several data storage providers rallied Monday, extending a surge in recent weeks. The reason? AI-driven demand that has sent tech-stock investors looking for opportunity in a range of segments that offer the potential for growth.

headline: Why Is Seagate Technology (STX) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) jumped 7.2% in the afternoon session after Bank of America reaffirmed its 'Buy' rating and significantly raised its price target on the stock to $215 from $170.
